data: Michael Lee works as a Management Consultant at ConsultCo with 8 years of experience in the Strategy & Operations industry.
Michael Lee is based in New York, NY, United States.
Michael Lee has expertise in operational efficiency, change management, and market entry strategies.
Michael Lee has a background of over 8 years at top consulting firms.
Michael Lee led a 50 million dollar cost optimization project that saved 10% in annual expenses.
Michael Lee's expertise aligns with operational strategy needs, according to notes from internal research and a referral from John Smith.
